meta.title: PacMan meets NEM
meta.description: An Open Source PacMan game using the NEM Blockchain featuring XEM Accounts, Sponsored Play, Pay per Play with XEM and NEM blockchain Mosaics.
meta.keywords: pacman, pacnem, multiplayer pacman, multiplayer game, blockchain, nem, nemblockchain, pacman nem, mosaics, namespaces, multi signature, multisig, sponsored play, pay per play, pay-per-play, crypto currencies, cryptocurrency, game advertisement, game sponsor, blockchain gaming

guest.title_blue_box: Decentralized Autonomous Multiplayer Pacman Game (Read the Blog article about this Project)
guest.welcome_paragraph_1_1: Welcome to the Pacnem Game. This game is a Free & Open Source Node.js Decentralized Autonomous Game (DAG) using the nem Blockchain.
guest.welcome_paragraph_1_2: This project uses the nem Blockchain to authenticate Players as well as for Managing Game Sponsors and Mosaics Payouts which are done with Multi Signature Accounts. The game will also store Game Credits and High Scores on the blockchain. This game will reflect how easy it is to use nem in your applications or games business layers and will emphasize the easy Setup for sponsoring and advertising Software in the Gaming industry using the nem Blockchain and Instant Payments.
guest.play_mode_explain: PacNEM can be played in Sponsored Play, Pay per Play or Share per Play modes. In sponsored play mode you won't need to pay anything, you only need to watch the Sponsor Advertisement and will then be able to Play with one of our Sponsored Accounts! The Pay per Play mode lets you Buy evias.pacnem:heart Game Credits directly to your XEM Wallet. The Share per Play mode requires you to Share some of our Sponsor's content and you will then be rewarded some evias.pacnem:heart Game Credits. These different game modes were introduced to show the easiness of integration of the nem Blockchain in the Gaming Industry.
guest.play_type_sponsored: Sponsored Play: Sponsored Pay per view Advertising with nem.
guest.play_type_payperplay: Pay per Play: Play with your own Wallet and buy evias.pacnem:heart Game Credits!
guest.play_type_shareperplay: Share per Play: Play with your own Wallet and earn evias.pacnem:heart Game Credits for Sharing content!
guest.enter_data_to_join: Please enter a username and XEM address below. Hit the 'Enter' button to join the Pacnem experience.
guest.security_paragraph_1: Pacnem will never ask you to enter Sensitive information like your Password or your Private Key.

forms.error_format_address: Invalid XEM address, please verify your input.
forms.error_network_address: XEM address cannot be used on this blockchain

player.select_room_message: Thank you, Now please select a Room to Join in the list.

donations.title: Share - Links - Donations
donations.description: This game was developed with Node.js, Socket.io, Handlebars and nem and started as a fork of this project. This project aims to use nem in as many ways as possible in order for me to collect experience in the blockchain application development industry.
donations.explain: If you like the initiative, and for the sake of good mood, I recommend you take a few minutes to Donate a beer or Three [because belgians like that] by sending some XEM (or whatever Mosaic you think pays me a few beers someday!) to my XEM Wallet

links.intro: Following is a list of Links / References useful during Development of this project

scores.title: Pacnem High Scores
scores.explain: Welcome to the Pacnem High Scores. The following list is held up to date via the nem blockchain.
scores.empty_highscores: Currently, no PacNEM high scores have been saved to the blockchain yet.

invoices.placeholder_recipient: PacNEM XEM Address will appear here
invoices.buy_hearts_explain: Howdy dear nember! You selected the Pay per Play mode and will now need to buy Game Credits. Game Credits for the PacNEM game are published to the NEM blockchain in the form of evias.pacnem:heart Mosaics. 1 of our Hearts mosaic is the equivalent of 1 Multiplayer Pacman Game Session.
invoices.buy_hearts_warning_game_autonomous: This game runs autonomously, Please understand that we cannot reimburse or transfer back XEMs you might have sent to PacNEM without a Message.
invoices.buy_hearts_warning_message: Please, Do not forget to add the Message below in your Transaction to PacNEM!
